content.rendered:
It is the responsibility of the student to ensure that providers take their insurance.

Download Referrals as PDF

Local Group Practices

Mental Wellness Partners

Heather Kurera, D.O.
Percival “John” Baldrias, PMHNP-BC
820 N. Mountain Ave.
Suite 215
Upland, CA 91786
(909) 920-5150
Website

Accepted Insurances: Blue Cross, Blue Shield, Cigna, HealthNet, Magellan, MediCare, United Behavioral

  • Provides Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations
  • Provides services to patients with ADHD

Inland Psychiatric Medical Group

Henry Khin, M.D.
Pucha Kayala, M.D.
540 W. Baseline
Suite 3
Claremont, CA 91711
(909) 625-7175
Website

Accepted Insurances: Aetna HMO/PPO, Blue Cross, Blue Shield, United Health Care, Cigna, Healthnet, IEHP

  • Provides Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations

Aspen Psychological & Psychiatric Services

Theresa Anderson, NP (Available on Tuesdays and 1 Saturday/month)
10737 Laurel St.
Suite 230
Rancho Cucamonga, CA 91730
(909) 989-5556 (Ext. 1)
Website

Accepted Insurances: Blue Cross, Blue Shield, Aetna, United Healthcare, Magellan

  • Provides Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations
  • Evaluates for depression, anxiety, PTSD

Foothill Psychological Services

Yuri Villaruel, NP (Only available on Tuesdays)
954 West Foothill Blvd.
Upland, CA 91786
(909) 946-4222
Website

Accepted Insurances: Blue Cross, IEHP, MediCare, Optum, United Behavioral Health (for NP)

  • Conducts Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations

Chino Valley Community Health Center

previously Foothill Psychological Services

13193 Central Ave.
Suite 200
Chino, CA 91710
(909) 902-9111
Website

Accepted Insurances: Optum, Blue Cross, MediCare, United Behavioral Health, Cigna, IEHP (Inland Empire Health Plan), Molina

Once patients are established, can conduct:

  • Psychoeducational Evaluations
  • Testing for Learning Disabilities
  • Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations

WellPsyche Medical Group

3400 Inland Empire Blvd.
Suite 101
Ontario, CA 91764
(310) 871-0670
Website | Email

Accepted Insurances: Anthem Blue Cross, Aetna, Blue Shield CA, Cigna, United Behavioral Health, Magellan, and Optum

Students can send email with provided information (Name, DOB, Contact info, patients’ insurance) when asking if insurance is covered and to also ask for services such as Psychoeducational evaluations, testing for learning disabilities, and Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations are available

Mountain View Behavioral Health

585 N. Mountain Ave.
Suite B
Upland, CA 91786
(909) 931-3388
Website
Accepted Insurances: Aetna, Blue Cross Blue Shield, Cigna,, United Behavioral Health, Managed Health Network, etc (Healthnet).

  • Provides Learning Disabilities diagnosis, but no testing
  • Provides Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations

Individual Psychiatrists

Makisha Lawrence, Psy.D.
Maurice Levy, Ph.D.
Rebekah So, Psy.D.

101 N. Indian Hill Blvd.
Suite C1-200
Claremont, CA 91711
(866) 200-9090
Website | Email

Preferred Contact Method: Phone
Insurances Accepted: Beacon Health, Magellan

  • Conducts Psychoeducational evaluations – depending on students’ needs Testing for Learning Disabilities
  • Provides Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations

Tamara Obregon Madera, Psy.D.

219 N. Indian Hill Blvd.
Suite 202A
Claremont, CA 91711
(626) 386-3036

Website | Email

Preferred Contact Method: Phone
Insurances Accepted: Blue Shield, Cigna, Healthnet/MHN

  •  Conducts Psychoeducational evaluations
  •  Conducts testing for Learning Disabilities

Monica Ellis-Blied, Ph.D.

105 S. Spring St.
Claremont, CA 91711
(909) 741-2849
Website | Email

Preferred Contact Method: Phone/Text/Email
Insurances Accepted: Inland Empire Health Plan (IEHP), Medi-Care, Care Credit, Private Pay, (Not in Network with Wellfleet/Student insurance, but can provide a superbill/receipt for student reimbursement)

  • Conducts ADHD and Autism Testing
  • Conducts Psychoeducational Evaluations
  • Emotional Support Animal (ESA) recommendations (letters for established clients)

Low Cost Services

Norooz Clinic Foundation

Krystal Vu
1560 Brookhollow
Suite 212
Santa Ana, CA 9270
(714) 386-9171
Website

No Insurance needed (Non-profit); Provides Low-Income Family discount

  • Conducts Psychoeducational evaluations
  • Disorder Diagnostic testing for ADHD and other neuropsych disabilities
